amendment.description: To require fuller reporting on possible costs to taxpayers of any budget submitted by the President.

vote.text: Amendment SA 195 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 195 proposed by Senator Coats.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 195 proposed by Senator Coats.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 195 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
